desc:
Elevate Your Web Design with BOSS UI Library!

Are you a web developer, designer, or a learner looking for stunning UI components? Look no further! BOSS UI Library is the ultimate open-source collection of modern, responsive, and ready-to-use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript elements.

Key Features:

- Massive Component Library
Access a growing collection of Buttons, Inputs, Cards, Loaders, Toggles, and more.

- Live Preview
Don't just read the code - see it in action! Tap on any element to open a full-screen interactive preview before you use it.

- Built-in Code Manager
Create and save your own custom elements directly inside the app!

- Auto-Save & Backup
Never lose your work. Easily backup your data via text code.

- 100% Offline Capable
Work without internet! Your library and saved components work perfectly offline.

Who is this for?
- Web Developers
- UI/UX Designers
- AppCreator24 Users

Download BOSS UI today!

title: Spotify (Premium)
desc:
Listen to songs, play podcasts, create playlists and discover music you'll love

Explore an extensive library of free music and podcasts with Spotify. Curate your own music playlists and stream millions of free songs, albums and podcasts on your mobile or tablet. Subscribe to Spotify Premium to download and listen to music offline, and unlock our catalog of audiobooks.

Why choose Spotify as your go-to music and podcast app? Here, you can:
- Listen to over 80 million songs and 4 million podcasts
- Explore Spotify's selection of specially-crafted artist playlists
- Easily search for your favourite songs, albums, artists and podcasts
- Discover personalized music recommendations tailored to your unique taste
- Subscribe to your favourite free podcasts so you never miss an episode, and even curate your own podcast library

Spotify Free is more than a music player - find the sounds you love and stream free music and podcasts online. Enjoy personalized music playlists or curate and share your own, discover the hottest new releases, explore upcoming events from your favourite artists, and more.
- Stream millions of songs and podcasts for free
- Create playlists with your favourite music
- Share songs and playlists with friends and family (feature restrictions may apply in some regions)
- Discover personalized playlists, and collaborate on playlists with your friends
- Enjoy your personal Discover Weekly playlist to find your new favourite songs every week
- Stay in the know with the Release Radar and New Music Friday playlists\n- Find nearby events and gigs by your favourite artists
- See your most played songs, genres, artists, podcasts and more with yearly Spotify Wrapped
- Stream music across your devices with Spotify
- Use Spotify Connect and enjoy listening on smart speakers, desktop, laptop, smart TV, Chromecast, PlayStation¬Æ, XBOX¬Æ, smartwatch, in your car and more.

Spotify Premium ‚Äì enjoy the benefits of an offline music player and stream music without Wi-Fi. The music downloader option allows you to access your songs, podcasts, audiobooks and playlists offline, wherever you are.
- Listen to music, podcasts and audiobooks without ads
- Ad-free music listening: enjoy your music with no ad interruptions
- Enjoy full on-demand playback
- Audiobooks in Premium are currently available in the UK, US, Australia, Ireland, New Zealand and Canada. Discover 250,000+ titles.
- Enjoy high quality audio on supported devices
- Spotify's AI DJ: a personalized guide that knows your music taste so well it can choose what to play for you
- Enjoy on desktop, mobile phone, tablet, computer, smartwatch, and in your car
- Listen and control the listening session together by hosting a Jam in real time with friends
- Download and listen to music, podcasts and audiobooks offline, without an internet connection
- No contract required - cancel your Spotify Premium subscription whenever you want

LOVE SPOTIFY?
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spotify\nFollow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@spotify

title: Test Anylisis
desc:
Track, Analyze, and Improve your Exam Scores with **Test Analysis**.

Ace your competitive exams like JEE Mains, JEE Advanced, NEET, and Boards with the ultimate student companion. **Test Analysis** is designed to help you track your mock test performance, visualize your progress, and focus on your weak areas. Whether you are studying Physics, Chemistry, or Maths, this app is your personal report card manager.

**Why use Test Analysis for your preparation?**
- **Smart Score Tracking:** Easily enter and manage marks for Physics, Chemistry, and Maths (or any custom subjects).
- **Visual Analytics:** View beautiful, interactive graphs that show your progress over time. Spot upward or downward trends instantly.
- **Subject-wise Breakdown:** Filter your data to see how you are performing in specific subjects versus your overall aggregate.
- **Multi-Exam Profiles:** Preparing for multiple exams? Create separate profiles for JEE, Boards, or BITSAT and track them individually.

**Flexible & Secure:**
- **Guest Mode:** Start using the app immediately without an account. Your data stays local on your device.
- **Cloud Sync:** Login with a secure account (Username/Email) to save your data permanently and sync across devices.
- **Data Freedom:** Export your test history as JSON for backups or share it with mentors. Import data anytime.

**Designed for Students:**
- **Distraction-Free UI:** A clean, modern interface that lets you focus on your stats.
- **Dark & Light Themes:** Switch between Dark Mode for late-night study sessions and Light Mode for daytime use.
- **Profile Customization:** Set your bio and goals to keep yourself motivated every time you open the app.

**Key Features:**
- Add unlimited test records with Title, Date, and Marks.
- Automatic percentage and average score calculation.
- Horizontal scrolling graphs for long-term history.
- Secure and fast performance.

Stop guessing your progress. Start analyzing it. Download **Test Analysis** today and take the first step towards your dream college/rank!"
